intro: Schismatoglottis hayana, commonly known as the Hayana arrowroot, is a species of flowering plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia, particularly found in the Philippines. This plant is characterized by its arrow-shaped leaves and produces small, inconspicuous flowers. Schismatoglottis hayana is typically grown as an ornamental plant due to its unique foliage. It prefers warm, humid environments and well-draining soil to thrive.
